```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
Year <- 2021
```

All of the following plots were made for the `r Year` SOE report (Not all were used in the final report). This is the full collection of figures.

## Mid Atlantic Bight

```{r ppr1, echo = F, eval = T, fig.cap="Primary Production Required", out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/PPR-MAB-0_80.png"))
```

```{r mtl1, echo = F, eval = T,fig.cap="Mean Trophic Level",  out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/MTL-MAB-0_80.png"))
```

```{r pp1, echo = F, eval = T, fig.cap="Primary Production", out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/PP-MAB.png"))
```

```{r comp1, echo = F, eval = T, fig.cap="Composition of Landings", out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/composition-MAB-0_80.png"))
```

```{r fog1, echo = F, eval = T,fig.cap="Fogarty Index",  out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/fogarty-index-Constant-MAB.png"))
```

```{r ry1, echo = F, eval = T,fig.cap="Ryther Index", out.width='80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0("figures/2021/ryther-index-MAB.png"))
```
